qrList.label: Send
qrList.message:
/run battlestripsv2.userprocess |
/if left=blocktrigger right=true rule=eq else={:
  /send {{getvar::userinput}}
{{pipe}} |
  /trigger
:}
{:
  /setvar key=blocktrigger false
:} ||
/setinput

qrList.label: getuserinfo
qrList.message:
/echo Setting up your grids, please wait |
/delay 100 |
/setvar key=toadd user |
/run battlestripsv2.gentargets

qrList.label: -- gentargets
qrList.message:
// legacy - this one requires the regex script regexreplace |

/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=startregex \[\s*"?\s* |
/setvar key=endregex (,\s*"?\|\s*"?\s*\]) |
/run creamsan.shuffle | /setvar key=targetsbase |

/setvar key=i 0 |
/setvar key=looping true |
/while left=looping right=true rule=eq {:
	/run creamsan.regextract | /setvar key=clothing |
	/setvar key=varname clothing |
	/run creamsan.isvardefined |
	/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq {:
	  /setvar key=looping false | /break
	:} |
	
	/flushvar toreplace |
	/setvar key=regex \[[^,]+?\]\|(?<=\[\s*){{getvar::clothing}},\s* |
	/setvar key=regexflags i |
	/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::tomsgprocess}} |
	/setvar key=tomsgprocess |
	
	/setvar key="{{getvar::toadd}}clothes" index={{getvar::i}} {{getvar::clothing}} |
	/getvar index={{getvar::i}} targetsbase |
	/setvar key="{{getvar::toadd}}targets" index={{getvar::i}} |
	
	/if left=toadd right=user rule=eq {:
	  /setvar key=regex {{pipe}} |
	  /setvar key=toreplace {{pipe}}ðŸ›¥ï¸ |
	  /regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::userboardhtml}} |
	  /setvar key=userboardhtml
	:} |
	
	/addvar key=i 1
:} |

/if left=toadd right=user rule=eq else={: /echo {{getvar::girlname}}'s grids have been successfully generated. :} {: /echo Your grids have been successfully generated. :}

qrList.label: gentargets
qrList.message:
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/run creamsan.shuffle | /setvar key=targetsbase |

/setvar key=i 0 |
/setvar key=looping true |
/while left=looping right=true rule=eq {:
	/re-exec find=/(?<=\[\|\,\s)[^\,\]]+/i {{getvar::tomsgprocess}} | /setvar key=clothing |
	/getvar index=0 clothing | /setvar key=clothing | /getvar index=0 clothing | /setvar key=clothing |
	/run varname=clothing creamsan.isvardefined |
	/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq {:
	  /setvar key=looping false | /break
	:} |
	
	/re-replace find=/\[[^,]+?\]\|(?<=\[\s*){{getvar::clothing}},\s*/i replace={{noop}} {{getvar::tomsgprocess}} |
	/setvar key=tomsgprocess |
	
	/setvar key="{{getvar::toadd}}clothes" index={{getvar::i}} {{getvar::clothing}} |
	/getvar index={{getvar::i}} targetsbase |
	/setvar key="{{getvar::toadd}}targets" index={{getvar::i}} |
	
	/if left=toadd right=user rule=eq {:
		/re-replace find=/{{pipe}}/i replace={{pipe}}ðŸ›¥ï¸ {{getvar::userboardhtml}} | /setvar key=userboardhtml
	:} |
	
	/addvar key=i 1
:} |

/if left=toadd right=user rule=eq else={: /echo {{getvar::girlname}}'s grids have been successfully generated. :} {: /echo Your grids have been successfully generated. :}

qrList.label: hitplayer
qrList.message:
/pass {{getvar::board}}clothes |
/getvar {{pipe}} |
/setvar key=arr |
/run topopidx=0 creamsan.pop |
/setvar key="{{getvar::board}}clothes" |
/setvar key=clothes |
/setvar key=clothing {{getvar::popval}} |
/setvar key=jbout - After some exchange of shots, with a few misses here and there, {{getvar::namedisp}} sinks one of {{getvar::namedisp2}}'s clothes at grid coordinate {{getvar::tmpinputgrid}}.
- {{getvar::namedisp2}}'s {{getvar::clothing}} magically disappears.
- {{getvar::namedisp2}}'s remaining clothing: {{getvar::clothes}}
- Vividly narrate this scene and {{getvar::girlname}}'s reaction. |

/run varname=clothes creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq {: /run battlestripsv2.announcewinner :}

qrList.label: announcewinner
qrList.message:
/setvar key=gameover true |
/echo severity=warning {{getvar::namedisp}} wins! |
/setvar key=jbout {{getvar::jbout}}
- {{getvar::namedisp2}} has no more clothes remaining.
- {{getvar::namedisp}} is the winner.

qrList.label: giveup
qrList.message:
/setvar key=looping false |
/setvar key=gameover true |
/echo severity=error Game over |
/setvar key=jbout - {{user}} gives up.
- All his clothes magically disappear.
- {{getvar::girlname}} is the winner.

qrList.label: -- resumegame
resumegame
